articles.title: Warner Bros. Discovery confirms receipt of amended offer from Paramount Skydance
articles.mainIdea: Warner Bros. Discovery confirms receipt of amended offer from Paramount Skydance
articles.summary: TipRanks: Warner Bros. Discovery confirms receipt of amended offer from Paramount Skydance. Warner Bros. Discovery (WBD) confirmed that it has received an amended, unsolicited tender offer from Paramount Skydance (PSKY) to acquire all of the outstanding shares of Warner Bros. Discovery common stock. The Warner Bros. Discovery Board of Directors, consistent with its fiduciary duties and in consultation with its independent financial and legal advisors, will carefully review and consider Paramount Skydance’s offer in accordance with the terms of Warner Bros. Discovery’s agreement with Ne Related tickers mentioned: PSKY, WBD.
